content: Take a right at the end and keep following the narrow path to find a third Monk Supporter and Golden Lotus Guai in front of another cave entrance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-White'.
The content is as follows:
Take a right at the end and keep following the narrow path to find a third Monk Supporter and Golden Lotus Guai in front of another cave entrance.
